app.util

Class SQLExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.sql.SQLExecutor

  • public class SQLExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for executing SQL queries in the database and handling the results.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SQLExecutor(JavaInterface databaseManager, javafx.scene.text.TextFlow consoleTextFlow, MainWindowController mainWindowController)
      Creates a new instance of SQLExecutor with the specified database manager, console text flow, and main window controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeQueries(java.lang.String code, boolean isFromEditor)
      Executes the SQL queries from the given code in the database and displays the results in the application.
      boolean isModifyingQuery(java.lang.String query)
      Checks if the given SQL query is a modifying query (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, DROP).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLExecutor

        public SQLExecutor(JavaInterface databaseManager,
                   javafx.scene.text.TextFlow consoleTextFlow,
                   MainWindowController mainWindowController)
        Creates a new instance of SQLExecutor with the specified database manager, console text flow, and main window controller.
        Parameters:
        databaseManager - the JavaInterface instance for executing SQL queries
        consoleTextFlow - the TextFlow component for displaying messages
        mainWindowController - the MainWindowController instance for updating the tables list

    • Method Detail

      • executeQueries

        public void executeQueries(java.lang.String code,
                           boolean isFromEditor)
        Executes the SQL queries from the given code in the database and displays the results in the application. Results include the execution time, success message, and error message if any.
        Parameters:
        code - the SQL code to execute
        isFromEditor - true if the code is executed from the editor, false if executed from the other sources

      • isModifyingQuery

        public boolean isModifyingQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Checks if the given SQL query is a modifying query (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, DROP).
        Parameters:
        query - the SQL query to check
        Returns:
        true if the query is a modifying query, false otherwise
